derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Portuguese xagara, jag(a)ra, from Malayalam cakkarā, from Sanskrit śarkarā 'sugar'

means.word_mean: 1. unrefined brown sugar made from palm sap

auth_sentence.content: We watched a family make jaggery, a palm sugar fudge mixed with sesame or plums and rolled by hand, once much loved by the Raj.
